name: Party Baller
description:
You play as Baller who has forgotten his best friend Marble's birthday and must rush to his house to get there for his surprise party. Navigate through half pipe tunnels and slide along bumpy walls to get to the party!

Controls

Left / A - Move Left

Right / D - Move Right

Spacebar - Jump

Enter - Make Selection on Main Menu

Prototype made by:

Dhaman Mehta - Producer

Danielle Powers - Artist

Kolton Eichers - Technical Artist

Abraham Hoogendoorn - Engineer

Fengkai Zhou - Engineer
